home_page_subtitle: Transform your ever-changing Garmin Live-Tracking link into a persistent URL and ensure continuous updates with built-in activity start notifications for your friends and family.
hiw_create_your_link_text: When you create your own personal persistent LiveTrack link, we give you a dedicated contact to add to your phone — it contains an email address that connects to our service.
hiw_set_in_garmin_app_text: In the Garmin Connect™ app, you add our contact as a recipient for your LiveTrack sessions. That way, whenever you start LiveTrack, Garmin will send the tracking email to us.
hiw_we_handle_the_link_title: We handle the link for you
hiw_we_handle_the_link_text: Every time your start a LiveTrack session, Garmin sends us a link, our service catches it, updates your personal page, and makes sure it always shows the newest link.
hiw_share_once_done_forever_text: Instead of sending your friends a new link every ride, just share your personal static URL once. They can bookmark it — it will always point to your most recent LiveTrack.
app_footer_notice_text: This service is in no way related to Garmin® but extends and simplifies the use of its LiveTrack feature.
